posts.postText: Sorry guys about my inactivity on jailbreak, and on Goldcraft. Just debating on either on just a wireless mouse or a keyboard, speakers, and a mouse for my laptop so that I can play Gmod from my bed or have the screen right in my face :/. What to do.....
